entry.title: combine-PDF
entry.content:
-- coding: utf-8 --

"""
@author: wanlin_cai
"""
import PyPDF2
pdf1 = open('C:/Users/wanlin_cai/Desktop/python-nju/paper1-test.pdf','rb')
pdf2 = open('C:/Users/wanlin_cai/Desktop/python-nju/paper2-test.pdf','rb')
pdf1Reader = PyPDF2.PdfFileReader(pdf1)
pdf2Reader = PyPDF2.PdfFileReader(pdf2)
pdf1Num = pdf1Reader.numPages
pdf2Num = pdf2Reader.numPages

pdfWriter = PyPDF2.PdfFileWriter()

for page1Num in range(1,pdf1Num):
page1 = pdf1Reader.getPage(page1Num)
pdfWriter.addPage(page1)

for page2Num in range(0,pdf2Num):
page2 = pdf2Reader.getPage(page2Num)
pdfWriter.addPage(page2)

pdfOutputFile = open('C:/Users/wanlin_cai/Desktop/python-nju/paper-all.pdf', 'wb')
pdfWriter.write(pdfOutputFile)
pdfOutputFile.close()
pdf1.close()
pdf2.close()
